data.prayer: Father, bring yourself glory in Saint Pierre du Bois. Through your servants plant 4 new churches that love you, love one another, and make disciples this year.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the LORD as the waters cover the sea.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Saint Pierre du Bois, Guernsey
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the state of Saint Pierre du Bois do things that will multiply their numbers, not just add to them.
data.verse: But thanks be to God, who always leads us triumphantly as captives in Christ and through us spreads everywhere the fragrance of the knowledge of Him.

data.prayer: Spirit, fill the 924 believers in the state of Saint Pierre du Bois with tears, because God is not obeyed by those around them.
data.verse: Streams of tears flow from my eyes, for your law is not obeyed.

data.prayer: Jesus, teach the believers in the state of Saint Pierre du Bois that love for you and obedience to you are connected.
data.verse: If you love me, keep my commands.

data.prayer: Father, you desire to blot out the sins of the people of Saint Pierre du Bois, Guernsey. You said, if they turn to you, you will dissolve their sins like mist.
data.verse: I have blotted out, as a thick cloud, your transgressions, and, as a cloud, your sins. Return to me, for I have redeemed you.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up prophets in Saint Pierre du Bois who can call the church to holiness and purity, preparing your church as a bride for your Son.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every believer in Saint Pierre du Bois, Guernsey to do the work of an evangelist with their friends and neighbors.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist
